short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Refresh your Power BI Dashboard every 10 seconds with ease using our Chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate your Power BI Dashboard updates effortlessly with our Chrome extension. With 'Power BI Dashboard Refresher,' your data is always current. Activate it on your dashboard after loading and forget it as your dashboards refresh every 10 seconds, ensuring you have the latest insights at your fingertips. Stay in the loop and make real-time decisions with ease.
